text: Ceillac is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D60 and D260 roads pass through the commune. == Geography == The land around Ceillac is mountainous. The commune borders the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department and is around two miles away from the France-Italy border. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Ceillac
